text: (ya'akup napi yusuhpai nokki) â€˜â€˜en arumaik kulantaiye! Ni kanta kanavai un cakotararkalitam kurate. (Avvaru kurinal,) avarkal unakku yatenum tinkilaikkac cati ceyvarkal. Enenil, niccayamaka saittan manitanukkup pakirankamana etiri avan. (Cati ceyyumaru avarkalai avan tuntak kutum)'' enru kurinar
